author_ssm: Susan Kriete; revised by Marybeth Kavanagh in April 2020.
unittitle_ssm: New-York Historical Society Collection of Photographic Slides Collection
abstract_ssm: This collection is a format-based collection for small accessions of slides. It includes photographic slides of New York City in the 1960s and 1970s taken by amateur photographers Herbert Sendecki and Ray H. Billings.
